name: AP Bio
description:
A quick game to experience AP Biology.  Use the right and left arrow keys to move and the up arrow to jump. You get points for collecting lab books and text books and lose points when you're hit by distractions; the stress monsters and cat memes. 

Visit www.biologysimulations.com for biology simulations and virtual labs.

A donation for this game supports the development of biology learning tools for classroom use. Any amount is appreciated!
